content: Now go back to The Emerald Hall and up to the altar near where you respawned. Collect the Loong Balm drink from the altar then turn left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
Now go back to The Emerald Hall and up to the altar near where you respawned. Collect the Loong Balm drink from the altar then turn left.
